value.message: Error log in catch block does not include stack trace or context information.
value.suggestion: Log error.stack and relevant context (e.g., packageName, version) in the catch block.

value.message: Access control error in getNPMPackageInfo: if an exception occurs, returns null instead of denying access or handling securely.
value.suggestion: Return an explicit error or deny access when permission or access control errors occur, rather than returning null.
